channel.title: ZDR , a good stable base?/help with ZDR
channel.description:
Hey guys
i was thinking of using a ZDR base , i played it once before when it was up and i liked it and it didnt lagg for me , i need to know if its a good stable base and is it good for non-lagg when up to higher amount of players.
Thanks and there is another thing , if i wanted to use say... a delta client with the hp run energy and prayer energy at the top right , (bluurs client) how whould i set up all the items and objects so it works with ZDR?
or if anyone knows of a client that works with ZDR because the 1 it has with it is closed source and i dont know how to change the server ip ,
thanks for reading and any help is much appreciated,
- lewis`.
And ohh yea , is it possable to re-open a closed source client? i know it sounds stupid but...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 09:15:09 am[/size][hr]anyone? :(
